title: $:/core/modules/filters/subfilter.js
$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body
text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/Body/ \define config-visibility-title() $:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(currentTiddler)$ \end \define tiddler-body-edit() <$list filter="[all[current]has[_canonical_uri]]">
<> <$text text={{!!_canonical_uri}}/> <$edit-text field="_canonical_uri" class="tc-edit-fields" tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}}>
<$list filter="[all[current]!has[_canonical_uri]]"> <$reveal state="$:/state/showeditpreview" type="match" text="yes">
<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/editor" mode="inline"/>
<$transclude tiddler={{$:/state/editpreviewtype}} mode="inline"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/preview/output" mode="inline"/>
<$reveal state="$:/state/showeditpreview" type="nomatch" text="yes"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/editor" mode="inline"/> \end <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/EditTemplate/body]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains{!!draft.of}}]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <> <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/>

title: $:/core/ui/EditTemplate/controls
text:
\define config-title() $:/config/EditToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end \define tiddler-controls-edit()
<$view field="title"/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditToolbar]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"><$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>
\end <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/EditTemplate/controls]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains{!!draft.of}]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <> <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/>

title: $:/core/ui/EditTemplate/fields
text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/ \define config-title() $:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/$(currentField)$ \end \define config-filter() [[hide]] -[title{$(config-title)$}] \end \define current-tiddler-new-field-selector() [data-tiddler-title="$(currentTiddlerCSSescaped)$"] .tc-edit-field-add-name input \end \define new-field-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-field" $name={{{ [get[text]] }}} $value={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=<>/> \end \define new-field() <$vars name={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default=<>> <$button tooltip=<>> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-field" $name=<> $value={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <> <$reveal type="match" text="" default=<>> <$button> <> \end \define tiddler-fields-edit()
<$list filter="[all[current]fields[]] +[sort[title]]" variable="currentField" storyview="pop"> <$list filter=<> variable="temp">
<$text text=<>/>: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field=<> placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Value/Placeholder}} tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}}/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Remove/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Remove/Caption}}> <$action-deletefield $field=<>/> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
<$fieldmangler>
<>   <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Name/Placeholder}} focusPopup=<> class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-popup-handle" tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}} focus={{{ [{$:/config/AutoFocus}match[fields]then[true]] ~[[false]] }}}/>   <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Dropdown/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Dropdown/Caption}}>{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}  <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="">
<$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes"> <$linkcatcher to=<>>
<>
<$set name="newFieldName" value={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$list filter="[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]search:titlesort[]] -created -creator -draft.of -draft.title -modified -modifier -tags -text -title -type" variable="currentField"> <$link to=<>> <$text text=<>/>
<>
<$list filter="[fields[]search:titlesort[]] -[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]]" variable="currentField"> <$link to=<>> <$text text=<>/>
<$set name="currentTiddlerCSSescaped" value={{{ [escapecss[]] }}}> <$keyboard key="((add-field))" actions=<>> <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Value/Placeholder}} class="tc-edit-texteditor" tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}}/>   <$macrocall $name="new-field"/>
\end \whitespace trim <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/EditTemplate/fields]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains{!!draft.of}]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <> <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/>

title: $:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags
text:
\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/ \define tag-styles() background-color:$(backgroundColor)$; fill:$(foregroundColor)$; color:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define tag-body-inner(colour,fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB,icon) \whitespace trim <$vars foregroundColor=<> backgroundColor="""$colour$"""> > class="tc-tag-label tc-tag-list-item"> <$transclude tiddler="""$icon$"""/><$view field="title" format="text" /> <$button message="tm-remove-tag" param={{!!title}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-remove-tag-button">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} \end \define tag-body(colour,palette,icon) <$macrocall $name="tag-body-inner" colour="""$colour$""" fallbackTarget={{$palette$##tag-background}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}} icon="""$icon$"""/> \end \define tiddler-tags-edit()
<$fieldmangler> <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" storyview="pop"> <$macrocall $name="tag-body" colour={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}} icon={{!!icon}}/> <$set name="tabIndex" value={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}}> <$macrocall $name="tag-picker"/>
\end <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/EditTemplate/tags]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains{!!draft.of}]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <> <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/>

title: $:/core/ui/EditTemplate/title
text:
<$edit-text field="draft.title" class="tc-titlebar tc-edit-texteditor" focus="true" tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}}/> <$reveal state="!!draft.title" type="nomatch" text={{!!draft.of}} tag="div"> <$list filter="[{!!draft.title}!is[missing]]" variable="listItem">
{{$:/core/images/warning}} {{$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Exists/Prompt}}
<$list filter="[{!!draft.of}!is[missing]]" variable="listItem"> <$vars fromTitle={{!!draft.of}} toTitle={{!!draft.title}}> <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/RelinkOnRename" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> {{$:/language/EditTemplate/Title/Relink/Prompt}} <$list filter="[all[relinkable]relink:referenceslimit[1]]" variable="listItem"> <$vars stateTiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$set name="prompt" filter="[all[relinkable]relink:impossible]" value="EditTemplate/Title/Impossibles/Prompt" emptyValue="EditTemplate/Title/References/Prompt" > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="show"> <$button set=<> setTo="show" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} <$macrocall $name=lingo title=<> /> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show"> <$button set=<> setTo="hide" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$macrocall $name=lingo title=<> /> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show"> <$list variable="listItem" filter="[all[relinkable]!title[$:/StoryList]relink:referencessort[title]]" template="$:/plugins/flibbles/relink/ui/ListItemTemplate">

title: $:/core/ui/EditTemplate/type
text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/ \whitespace trim \define tiddler-type-edit()
<$fieldmangler> <>  <$edit-text field="type" tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Type/Placeholder}} focusPopup=<> class="tc-edit-typeeditor tc-edit-texteditor tc-popup-handle" tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}} focus={{{ [{$:/config/AutoFocus}match[type]then[true]] ~[[false]] }}}/> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Type/Dropdown/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Type/Dropdown/Caption}}>{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$button message="tm-remove-field" param="type" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-icon" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Type/Delete/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Type/Delete/Caption}}>{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
<$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes"> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="">
<$linkcatcher to="!!type"> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/language/Docs/Types/]each[group]sort[group-sort]]'>
<$text text={{!!group}}/>
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/language/Docs/Types/]group{!!group}] +[sort[description]]"><$link to={{!!name}}><$view field="description"/> (<$view field="name"/>)
\end <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/EditTemplate/type]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains{!!draft.of}]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <> <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/>

title: $:/core/ui/PageTemplate/story
text:
\whitespace trim
<section class="tc-story-river">

<section class="story-backdrop">

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/AboveStory]!has[draft.of]]">

<$transclude/>

</$list>

</section>

<$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]]" history="$:/HistoryList" template={{{ [subfilter{$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate}] }}} editTemplate={{{ [subfilter{$:/config/ui/EditTemplate}] }}} storyview={{$:/view}} emptyMessage={{$:/config/EmptyStoryMessage}}/>

<section class="story-frontdrop">

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/BelowStory]!has[draft.of]]">

<$transclude/>

</$list>

</section>

</section>

title: $:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/Advanced
caption: {{$:/language/TiddlerInfo/Advanced/Caption}}
text:
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerInfo/Advanced]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem">

<$transclude tiddler=<<listItem>> mode="block"/>

</$list>

title: $:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/Advanced/TemplateInfo
text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/TiddlerInfo/Advanced/TemplateInfo/ \define view-base() $:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/ \define edit-base() $:/config/ui/EditTemplate/ \define view-sections() titlebar icon title controls subtitle tags body \define edit-sections() title controls tags body type fields \define debug-on-actions(input:"list") <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates" $field="$input$" $subfilter="+[append]"/> \end \define debug-off-actions(input:"list") <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates" $field="$input$" $subfilter="+[remove]"/> \end \define debug-empty-message()

<$button tag="div" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" actions=<> tooltip="Click to show transcludify icons for custom templates."> {{$:/core/images/preview-closed}} {{$:/core/images/transcludify}} ''Debug Templates Off''

\end \define countTemplates() <$set name="allTags" filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tags[]prefix[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]tags[]prefix[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/]]"> {{{ [enlisttagging[]count[]] }}} \end ''Custom Tiddler Templates''
<$list variable="customTemplateHelp" filter="[{$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates!!template-help}match]" emptyMessage="""

<$button tag="div" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink tc-debug-config" setTitle="$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates" setField="template-help" setTo=<> tooltip="Open custom template help.">{{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} {{$:/core/images/help}} ''Template Help''

""" > <$button tag="div" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink tc-debug-config" setTitle="$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates" setField="template-help" setTo="" tooltip="Open custom template help.">{{$:/core/images/chevron-up}} {{$:/core/images/help}} ''Template Help'' There are ''<$macrocall $name="countTemplates" $output="text/plain"/>'' config tiddlers defined, but not all of them may apply to this tiddler. To define custom templates, tag a tiddler with one of the following tags. Click each tag to view or reorder the templates. Each tagged tiddlers' text is used in a `subfilter` operation using `currentTiddler` as input. The titles output by the filters will be transcluded as that section of the view or edit template, in the place of the default content. The filter results, i.e. the active "custom templates" for the current tiddler are shown below each tag next to the transcludify icon. Use the Debug Icons button to display a link to each custom template before the tanscluded content. Note: when the [[$:/config/Tiddlers/TitleLinks]] tiddler's text equals `yes`, then the trascludify icon will not link to the template, but it will still have an accurate tooltip. Each template's default content can be rendered within your own custom templates by using a `tiddler-body-view` or `tiddler-body-edit` macro, replacing `body` with one of the section names below. View Sections: <> Edit Sections: <> <$list variable="config" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains]" emptyMessage=<> >

<$button tag="div" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" actions=<> tooltip="Click to hide trascludify icons for custom templates."> {{$:/core/images/preview-open}} {{$:/core/images/transcludify}} ''Debug Templates On''

<$list variable="customTemplateHelp" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains:tags-view]" emptyMessage="""

<$button tag="div" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink tc-debug-config" actions=<> tooltip="Reveal view tags.">{{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} {{$:/core/images/transcludify}} ''View Templates''

""" > <$button tag="div" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink tc-debug-config" actions=<> tooltip="Hide view tags.">{{$:/core/images/chevron-up}} {{$:/core/images/transcludify}} ''View Templates'' <$list variable="configTag" filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tags[]prefix[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/]] +[enlistaddprefix]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/config}} <$macrocall $name="tag" tag=<> />
    <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag]">
  • <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <>
<$list variable="customTemplateHelp" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains:tags-edit]" emptyMessage="""

<$button tag="div" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink tc-debug-config" actions=<> tooltip="Reveal edit tags.">{{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} {{$:/core/images/transcludify}} ''Edit Templates''

""" > <$button tag="div" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink tc-debug-config" actions=<> tooltip="Hide edit tags.">{{$:/core/images/chevron-up}} {{$:/core/images/transcludify}} ''Edit Templates'' <$list variable="configTag" filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tags[]prefix[$:/config/ui/EditTemplate/]] +[enlistaddprefix]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/config}} <$macrocall $name="tag" tag=<> />
    <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag]">
  • <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <>

title: $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body
text: \define tiddler-body-view() <$list filter="[all[current]!has[plugin-type]!field:hide-body[yes]]"> <$transclude> <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/> \end <$reveal tag="div" class="tc-tiddler-body" type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" retain="yes" animate="yes"> <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/body]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <> <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/>

title: $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/plugin
text:
<$reveal tag="div" class="tc-tiddler-plugin-info" type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<folded-state>> text="hide" retain="yes" animate="yes">

<$list filter="[all[current]has[plugin-type]] -[all[current]field:plugin-type[import]]">
<$set name="plugin-type" value={{!!plugin-type}}>
<$set name="default-popup-state" value="yes">
<$set name="qualified-state" value=<<qualify "$:/state/plugin-info">>>
{{||$:/core/ui/Components/plugin-info}}
</$set>
</$set>
</$set>
</$list>

</$reveal>

title: $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle
text: \whitespace trim \define tiddler-subtitle-view() <$link to={{!!modifier}} /> <$view field="modified" format="date" template={{$:/language/Tiddler/DateFormat}}/> \end <$reveal type="nomatch" class="tc-subtitle" stateTitle=<> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes"> <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <> <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/>

title: $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags
text: \define tiddler-tags-view() <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop"/> \end <$reveal type="nomatch" class="tc-tags-wrapper" stateTitle=<> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes"> <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/tags]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <> <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/>

title: $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title
text:
\whitespace trim \define title-styles() fill:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define config-title() $:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end \define tiddler-controls-view() <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> \end \define tiddler-icon-view() <$set name="foregroundColor" value={{!!color}}> >> <$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}> <$transclude tiddler={{$:/config/DefaultTiddlerIcon}}/> \end \define tiddler-title-view() <$list filter="[all[current]removeprefix[$:/]]">

$:/<$text text=<>/>

<$list filter="[all[current]!prefix[$:/]]">

<$view field="title"/>

\end \define tiddler-titlebar-view()
<$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/controls]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <> <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value={{$:/config/Tiddlers/TitleLinks}}> <$link> <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/icon]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/> <$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/title]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/>
\end
<$list variable="sectionTemplate" filter="[all[current]subfilter:tag[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate/titlebar]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$list variable="debugTemplate" filter="[[$:/config/ui/Debug/Templates]contains]"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="yes"><$link to=<> tooltip=<> >{{$:/core/images/transcludify}} <$transclude tiddler=<> > <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/MissingTiddler/Hint"/> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default="" state=<> class="tc-tiddler-info tc-popup-handle" animate="yes" retain="yes"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerInfoSegment]!has[draft.of]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo]]" variable="listItem"><$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>

title: $:/plugins/joshuafontany/silatglossary/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle/named
